data.description: Add a single IP to the firewall IP blocking list
data.title: W0024-ADD IP TO XDR IPv4 BLOCKING LIST

data.description:
This workflow blocks the given IP address on a Cisco Meraki MX L3 outbound firewall (using the input observable as the rule's destination). Supported observable: ip

Documentation: https://ciscosecurity.github.io/sxo-05-security-workflows/workflows/0019

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets: Cisco Meraki

Steps:
[] Make sure the observable type provided is supported
[] Get the Meraki API key from a global variable (optional)
[] Loop through each organization
[]> Check the organization is in scope
[]> Loop through each network
[]>> Check the network is in scope
[]>> Get the existing L3 firewall rules
[]>> Add the new L3 firewall rule
[]>> Update the firewall rules
data.title: *W0077-Meraki - MX - L3 Outbound Firewall BLOCK

data.description: This workflow apply an endpoint quarantine thru ISE ANC Policy. supported observable types : ip address, mac address
data.title: Cisco ISE - ERS - ANC Policy - Apply to Endpoint
